mapper.select: SELECT /* progrmManageDAO.selectProgrmList_D */ PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS "progrmStrePath" , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS "progrmKoreanNm" , PROGRM_DC AS "progrmDc" , URL AS "URL" FROM lettnprogrmlist WHERE CONCAT(binary(PROGRM_FILE_NM), binary(REPLACE(PROGRM_KOREAN_NM, ' ','')), binary(REPLACE(PROGRM_DC, ' ','')), binary(URL)) like CONCAT('%', REPLACE(#{searchKeyword},' ',''), '%') LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT /* progrmManageDAO.selectProgrmListTotCnt_S */ COUNT(*) AS totcnt FROM lettnprogrmlist WHERE binary(PROGRM_KOREAN_NM) like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
SELECT /* progrmManageDAO.selectProgrmNMTotCnt */ COUNT(*) AS totcnt FROM lettnprogrmlist WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{searchKeyword}

SELECT /* progrmManageDAO.selectProgrm_D */ PROGRM_FILE_NM AS progrmFileNm , PROGRM_STRE_PATH AS progrmStrePath , PROGRM_KOREAN_NM AS progrmKoreanNm , PROGRM_DC AS progrmDc , URL AS URL FROM lettnprogrmlist WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM = #{searchKeyword}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lettnprogrmlist /* progrmManageDAO.deleteProgrm_S */ WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM=#{progrmFileNm}
DELETE /* progrmManageDAO.deleteAllProgrm */ FROM lettnprogrmlist WHERE PROGRM_FILE_NM <> 'dir'
